column4: hi i'm trying to add a printer to a currently updated 9.04 system...  the printer is on a SMB share on my windows xp box...  the Printer Configuration tool keeps crashing while browsing the shares...   is this a known issue
?  and does anyone have an easy work-around?
do you know the computer name of the XP desktop?  you can go to it directly without browsing using smb://DesktopNameHere/
